name: Expert Target Shooting
description:
Get ready to target the watermelons with sniper gun and shoot them. This is the super real shooting mission which will ultimately transform you into an expert fruit smasher shooter. The crazy target and hunting challenge is just now one click away from you. This is one of the best snipers shooting game with the super amazing 3D realistic environment. Many thrilling adventures and missions are waiting for you. Get trained with the super sniper gun to shoot the watermelons.

Enjoy with this crazy target shooting to feel the real fun and get the fruit smashing experience!
